title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, list models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat backend with LangChain abstractions.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama: chat UI, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible endpoint.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Convenient CLI wrapper that adds interactive chat, conversation history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS-Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot’s UI and shortcuts.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with synchronous, asynchronous and reactive (RxJava) APIs.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem wrapping Ollama’s REST API with idiomatic Ruby blocks.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Reference Docker Compose stack bundling Ollama server, WebUI, and GPU runtime profiles.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community .NET SDK for Ollama: strongly-typed client targeting .NET 6+ with async streams.

title: ollama-codellama-vscode
summary: Lightweight VS Code extension that uses CodeLlama via Ollama for inline code generation and explanation.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Reference RAG pipeline combining Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain for local document Q&A.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up ephemeral Ollama services in CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI wrapper exposing an OpenAI-compatible chat/completions endpoint backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-node-red
summary: Node-RED nodes to call Ollama generate/chat/embed directly from low-code IoT flows.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to Ollama’s REST API via reqwest.

title: ollama-chatgpt-plugin
summary: Unofficial ChatGPT retrieval plugin adapter that proxies queries to a local Ollama instance.
